name: Blowy Bits
description: Blowy Bits is a simple platformer game made on clickteam. The purpose of this project is to let ANYONE play it and have fun as the full game is planned to be free to easen it up for fellow gamers during this hard covid time  #platformer  #adventure  #retro  #other Credit to MrElit3hoboguy for recording my game!
